original_title: Litro Gas to revise prices tomorrow?
original_body_lines: Litro Gas Lanka, one of the country’s two largest suppliers of domestic Liquefied Petroleum (LP) gas, has decided to revise the prices of its products tomorrow (March 05).
However, a conclusive decision on the matter is yet to be taken.
According to the company, the prices would not be revised by a substantial amount.
Litro Gas Lanka further says it expects to provide the benefit of the recent appreciation of Sri Lankan rupee against the US dollar to its customers.
